name: The Ugly Geometry
description:
The Ugly Geometry!

Get to the top and overcome your insecurities.

I made this game in 3 hours (because I was busy making "Pessimist Pong"), for The RNJam (https://itch.io/jam/rnjam). The name of the game was given the the  Random Name Generator, made by  89o (https://89o.itch.io/rng), as you can see in the first screenshot.
